1 // Main behavior node for TurtleBot3
2 
3 #include "ros/ros.h"
4 #include "yaml-cpp/yaml.h"
5 #include "behaviortree_cpp_v3/behavior_tree.h"
6 #include "behaviortree_cpp_v3/loggers/bt_cout_logger.h"
7 #include "behaviortree_cpp_v3/loggers/bt_minitrace_logger.h"
8 #include "behaviortree_cpp_v3/loggers/bt_file_logger.h"
9 #include "behaviortree_cpp_v3/bt_factory.h"
10 #include "behaviortree_cpp_v3/loggers/bt_zmq_publisher.h"
11 
12 // #define LOG_TIME
13 
14 #ifdef LOG_TIME
15 #include "time_logger.h"
16 #endif
17 
18 #include "navigation_behaviors.h"
19 #include "vision_behaviors.h"
20 #include "manipulator_behaviors.h"
21 #include "gripper_behavior.h"
22 
23 #include "manipulator.h"
24 #include "helper.h"
25 #include "basket.h"
26 #include "tomato_queue.h"
27 #include "path_queue.h"
28 #include "robot.h"
29 #include "ba_types.h"
30 
31 
32 #include <unistd.h>
33 #include <stdio.h>
34 
35 #include "ba_interfaces.h"
36 
37 
38 
39 using namespace BT;
40 
41 int main(int argc, char **argv)
42 {
43  // Initialize ROS node
44  ros::init(argc, argv, "bt_node");
45  ros::NodeHandle nh;
46  ros::AsyncSpinner async_spinner(1);
47  async_spinner.start();
48  Manipulator manipulator;
49 
50  TomatoQueue tomato_queue_;
51  PathQueue p_queue;
52 
53  // Build a behavior tree from XML and set it up for logging
54  std::string behavior_tree_type;
55  ros::param::get("behavior_tree_type", behavior_tree_type);
56  BT::Tree tree;
57 
58  BT::BehaviorTreeFactory factory;
59  factory.registerNodeType<RobotInitializer>("RobotInitializer");
60  factory.registerNodeType<GoToPose>("GoToPose");
61  factory.registerNodeType<SetLocations>("SetLocations");
62  factory.registerNodeType<GetLocationFromQueue>("GetLocationFromQueue");
63  factory.registerNodeType<LookForObject>("LookForObject");
64  factory.registerNodeType<ValidateTomato>("ValidateTomato");
65  factory.registerNodeType<ManipulatorGraspTomato>("GraspTomato");
66  factory.registerNodeType<DequeueTomato>("DequeueTomato");
67  factory.registerNodeType<ManipulatorPregrasp>("pregraspTomato");
68  factory.registerNodeType<ManipulatorDropTomato>("dropTomato");
69  factory.registerNodeType<FilterTomatoQueue>("FilterTomatoQueue");
70  factory.registerNodeType<ManipulatorPostgraspRetreat>("RetreatZ");
71  factory.registerNodeType<ManipulatorScanPose>("ScanPose");
72  factory.registerNodeType<BasketCheck>("BasketFull");
73  factory.registerNodeType<BasketChange>("ChangeBasket");
74  factory.registerNodeType<GripperActuator>("ChangeGripper");
75  factory.registerNodeType<SaveCurrentLocation>("SaveCurrentLocation");
76  factory.registerNodeType<WriteChargingLocationToQueue>("WriteChargingLocationToQueue");
77  factory.registerNodeType<WriteBasketChangeLocationToQueue>("WriteBasketChangeLocationToQueue");
78  factory.registerNodeType<BatteryCharge>("BatteryCharge");
79  factory.registerNodeType<BatteryCheck>("BatteryCheck");
80  try
81  {
82  std::string bt_xml;
83  ros::param::get("bt_xml", bt_xml);
84  tree = factory.createTreeFromFile(bt_xml);
85  }
86  catch (const std::exception &e)
87  {
88  std::cerr << "Error creating BT from xml file!" << std::endl;
89  std::cerr << e.what() << '\n';
90  }
91 
92  for (auto &node : tree.nodes)
93  {
94  if (auto vis_node = dynamic_cast<IBAInitNodeHandle *>(node.get()))
95  {
96  vis_node->init(nh);
97  }
98  if (auto vis_node = dynamic_cast<IBAInitManipulatorNode *>(node.get()))
99  {
100  vis_node->init(manipulator);
101  }
102  if (auto vis_node = dynamic_cast<IBAInitTomatoQueue *>(node.get()))
103  {
104  vis_node->init(tomato_queue_);
105  }
106  if (auto vis_node = dynamic_cast<IBAInitPathQueue *>(node.get()))
107  {
108  vis_node->init(p_queue);
109  }
110  }
111 
112  unsigned max_msg_per_second = 25;
113  unsigned publisher_port = 1666;
114  unsigned server_port = 1667;
115  BT::PublisherZMQ publisher_zmq(tree, max_msg_per_second, publisher_port, server_port);
116 
117  // Tick the tree until it reaches a terminal state
118  BT::NodeStatus status = BT::NodeStatus::RUNNING;
119  auto start = ros::Time::now().toSec();
120  #ifdef LOG_TIME
121  BATimeLogger::InitFiles();
122  #endif
123  while (status == BT::NodeStatus::RUNNING)
124  {
125  status = tree.tickRoot();
126  ros::Duration(0.1).sleep();
127  }
128 
129  // Output final results
130  std::string status_str;
131  if (status == BT::NodeStatus::SUCCESS)
132  {
133  status_str = "SUCCESS";
134  }
135  else
136  {
137  status_str = "FAILURE";
138  }
139  auto stop = ros::Time::now().toSec();
140  auto seconds = stop-start;
141  ROS_INFO("Done with status %s!", status_str.c_str());
142  ROS_INFO("Used time: %.2lf", seconds);
143  #ifdef LOG_TIME
144  BATimeLogger::CloseFiles();
145  #endif
146  std::cout << '\n'
147  << "Press a key to continue...";
148  do
149  {
150  } while (std::cin.get() != '\n');
151 
152  return 0;
153 }
